name: Rotate Game
description:
Rotate Game

Rotate your blocks to match the target. Easy to learn, hard to master. Improve your 3D thinking.

Play over 100 levels + randomly generated levels. Can you finish all levels with 3 stars?

Play against the time in endless mode. How long can you make it?

Over 40 different blocks including simple colors, flags, and many more ... Unlock them all!

This is the first game I have created end of 2017 with 2 months of work put into it.

It was initially made for the Google Play Store, but was taken down. I will try to get it back up so you can play it on the go and the way it was intended to be played.

How to Play

Rotate your blocks (bottom) by using the arrow keys or the WASD keys.

But this will be explained in the first levels again ;)
